white: Jesus being pissed off that you fell asleep .
The four Horsemen of the apocalypse.
Wishing your enemy was an aborted fetus .
The sluggard who says “There’s a lion outside! I’ll be killer in the public square!” .
Saul hiding in the lost luggage .
Jael driving a tent peg through your sleeping head .
Killing everyone who pisseth against a wall .
People who misquote Jesus’ teaching on judging people .
Peter’s ADHD lack of impulse control and really shitty aim .
A rainbow promising that God can genocide you through other means .
Babies with the brains dashed against stones .
Unstable and needy women who let smooth-talking men break into their homes to take advantage of them .
John being faster than Peter. John being faster than Peter. Just to reiterate, John is faster than Peter. .
The curtain in the temple torn in two from top to bottom, the earth shaking, the rocks splitting, the tombs breaking open, the bodies of many holy people who had died raised to life .
A covenant cut by cupping crotch .
Your God unable to hear you because he's off taking a shit in the bushes .
A little sister with no breasts .
Paul urging his agitators for more than just the tip .
Jesus needing 2-3 people in order to show up .
The voice of God knocking you off your ass, on your ass .
Death by lion for not punching a prophet .
The mighty seed of a righteous man .
Jesus writing something in the sand (probably what type of an asshole you are) .
Bread freshly baked with human dung .
A biblical reason for avoiding menstruating women .
Ethnic cleansing in the name of the Lord .
Male prostitutes working the house of the LORD .
Burning animals in God’s general direction .
God speaking out of His ass .
Not slapping the hell out of a disciple (but really wanting to).
Accidentally sleeping with your future sister-in-law .
A concubine cut into pieces: Her severed remains FedEx-ed around the country .
A subpoena drafted so God will show up to court .
Miriam cursed for being a racist .
Lusting after lovers with donkey genitals and horse emissions .
Keeping your crushed testicles out of the congregation .
God ironically choking you to death with food because you complained about food .
Three nights in a big fish .
Hiding a false idol in your camel saddle .
A naked boy running through Gethsemane .
Claiming your wife is your sister, twice .
The Holy Spirit or really good wine? .
The church of Sardis, that refrained from shitting their pants .
Haman impaled on a 75 foot pole .
The same girl used by father and son .
Eating the body and blood of our Lord and Savior .
Peace on earth and goodwill toward men .
Job’s wife grinding for another man .
The little owl, the great owl, the white owl .
An angry demon kicking your naked ass .
God smearing shit on your face .
The head of John the Baptist on a plate .
Not being a whore, but wearing one’s uniform .
Throwing your sons freshly circumcised foreskin at your husband's penis to win an argument with God .
Being sold into slavery by your siblings .
Being long dead before the Lord answers your prayer .
The Lord making your uterus drop and your womb discharge .
Wearing camel hair and leather before it was cool .
The word of the Lord burning, like an STD when you pee .
A pair of she bears mauling a class of kindergarteners .
A dead fly in the ointment .
Ruth’s sexy time with a drunken relative .
Trampling the heads of the poor into the dust and denying justice to the oppressed .
God screaming: do you know who I am? .
Esther: the best virgin on the block .
Not keeping it in your pants, but keeping it in your family .
Not giving a shit about the Canaanites .
Hebrew erotica masquerading as Christ’s bride .
If you try her, you have to buy her .
Jesus burning the whole God-damned place down .
Passing out in church, falling out a window, and breaking your neck .
Ishmael getting the shittiest blessing in the Bible .
Drinking your sisters cup, deep and wide .
Making stupid life choices and blaming them on Philippians 4:13 .
Crusty, pus-filled sores on the inner thigh .
The Spirit moving you to dance semi-naked through the streets .
Ehud stabbing a dagger so far into Eglon, the folds of fat envelop it .
David carrying a warm sack of 200 foreskins .
A woman who keeps getting divorced (you’re probably the problem) .
The parting of the Reed Sea (aka Red Sea).
Five husbands and a piece on the side .
Millions of dead people floating past the ark .
A heifer, a she-goat, a ram, a turtle dove, and a young pigeon .
Head coverings keeping angel lust at bay .
Damnation for scribes, Pharisees, hypocrites, people who screw over widows, and those who pray too damn long .
Adam wishing he had stuck with the sheep with “come-hither looks .
Noah’s awkward sexual encounter with his son .
Those who sit on walls, eat their own excrement, and drink their own urine .
A foot broken off in your deceitful mouth .
The deep ditch of a whore .
Shaking the dust off your feet .
A roaring lion seeking whom he may devour .
The wise men, three years late for the nativity .
Showing no pity to the woman who stops two naked men from fighting by grabbing one by the penis, by cutting off her hand .

Being tricked into circumcision, and while still sore, having your throat slit, your sheep, oxen, asses, and everything in your house stolen, and your children and spouse enslaved, because you raped my little sister .
Jesus not caring about your family .
Sucking milk form Sarah’s sagging ninety-year-old breast .
A nasty thorn in the flesh .
Jesus striking your children dead to let all the churches know He is the one who searches hearts and minds .
Being a cripple is better than masturbation .
Dissolving your enemy into snail slime .
The Bible’s odd silence about necrophilia.
Cooking a young goat in its mother’s milk .
Jesus bring a knife, not a gun, to a fight .
Being afraid to have sex in your tent, for fear of Phineas' breaking in and stabbing you in the back with a spear .
The number of wives and concubines Solomon had .
Looking both ways before committing a murder .
Playing the whore with many lovers on top of every high hill and under every green tree .
Pretending your bat shit crazy to avoid having your head cut off .
